issue.title: [Python] Revert Array.equals changes + expose comparison ops in compute
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9445](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9445). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Revert part of ARROW-5854. Following a mailing list discussion when the Python Scalar classes were added (https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7519), to not implement rich comparisons, but keep `__eq__` to mean object equality, not element-wise equality.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9445?focusedCommentId=17156992) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7737
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7737>
